entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Pointe-à-la-Croix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 12:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: WSW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
